QuestData.Title: The Daughter Who Lived
QuestData.Description: I should have told you this earlier...$b$bHow do I put this...$b$bMorgan may have believed that his family was all dead, but, in fact, his daughter Sarah Ladimore is now a Watcher. She's always been troubled by the... circumstances... surrounding her father's death. Perhaps you could go to bring the news to her.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Watcher Sarah Ladimore in Darkshire.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes? My father...$b$b<Her eyes become downcast.>$b$bI wish... there was something I could have done for him... If only I had talked to him before he...
